1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Abort reasons.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.Reason
7  ( -- * Data type
8    AbortReason (..),
9
10    -- * Derived type
11    Ab, AbMap, AbManyMap, AbTest, IOAb, BinAb,
12  
13    -- * Constructor
14    abortBecause,
15    abortLine, abortLines,
16    abortPage,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO    as B
20
21
22-- --------------------------------------------  Type
23
24-- | Abort reason.
25data AbortReason = AbortReason
26    { abortReason :: String                -- ^ Reason in one line
27    , abortDetail :: [String]              -- ^ Detailed description
28    , abortNote   :: [String]              -- ^ Additional notes for long description
29    , abortPoint  :: [(String, B.CodePt)]  -- ^ Tag and aborting point
30    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
31
32
33-- --------------------------------------------  Deriving type
34
35-- | Abortable result, i.e., either of right result or abort reason.
36type Ab a = Either AbortReason a
37
38-- | Abortable mapping.
39type AbMap a = a -> Ab a
40
41-- | Abortable many map.
42type AbManyMap a = a -> Ab [a]
43
44-- | Abortable Boolean-valued function.
45type AbTest a = a -> Ab Bool
46
47-- | Abortable I/O.
48type IOAb a = IO (Ab a)
49
50-- | Type for abortable binary operators.
51type BinAb a = a -> a -> Ab a
52
53
54-- --------------------------------------------  Constructor
55
56-- | Construct abort reason with reason text.
57abortBecause :: String -> AbortReason
58abortBecause r = AbortReason r [] [] []
59
60-- | Construct abort reason with reason and detailed text.
61abortLine :: String -> String -> AbortReason
62abortLine  r d = AbortReason r [d] [] []
63
64-- | Construct abort reason with reason and multilined detailed text.
65abortLines :: String -> [String] -> AbortReason
66abortLines r d = AbortReason r d [] []
67
68-- | Construct abort reason with reason and note.
69abortPage :: String -> [String] -> AbortReason
70abortPage  r n = AbortReason r [] n []
71
